originalText.text: I spoke to Francis about a RTT feature on phone .he  resolve and remove that feature off my phone he's very knowledgeable and an excellent employee. Frances took care of me 3 times before. Visit 12/09/23 12:00pm

originalText.text: I never left a Google review before, but these guys are outstanding. They hooked me up quickly with the best possible deal I could get and really went above and beyond to provide me with excellent customer service. I'll definitely be recommending this location to anyone looking for a new phone or carrier, especially after getting burned by a bad deal and defective SIM card from Boost Mobile. I wish I had this kind of positive experience with every store I go to.

text.text: I never left a Google review before, but these guys are outstanding. originalText.text: Long time T-mobile family plan customer. Son needed a new SIM after mobile phone was stolen. T-mobile has a policy that allows them the discretion to replace lost SIMs at no charge. This location charged him for a SIM card. When we told him minutes after he purchased it that we’d get him a replacement  and that he should return it, they refused to refund him but kept the SIM card. Avoid this location at all costs as they have predatory practices.

originalText.text: I bought a phone and 6 days later doesn't work again. I paid for ensure combined with purchase. So, I went to change it in good way and good manners... And you know what? the Metro PCS agent from this store told me: "This phone was in water" and I said : WHAT?  no! And I explained just it doesn't work more, please ! Check it or change it... And again the agent said: IT IS IMPOSSIBLE, IT IS NEW AND MAYBE WET. immediately I tell her: "Show me" because you are insinuating that I am a liar! And you know what? I am so very old for have this conversation with someone like you... Etc. MY POINT WITH YOU READER: DO NOT GO THERE TO BUY SOMETHING. THAT PEOPLE US RUDE AND NO POLITED WITH CUSTOMERS. It was so disgusting to experience this ... NEVER AGAIN I WILL BUY THERE FOR THE PEOPLE TO ATTENDED IN THAT STORE. THEY ARE PEOPLE WITH POOR SERVICES AND CHEAPER GOOD MANNERS. Be careful readers!!!!
